TowerDefence

For a side project I ended up making a tower defence game much like the game Kingdom Rush. While the project has been programmed to a somewhat playable state, I ended up having one big problem I encounter a lot when attempting to make a game. I know nothing of art. Because of this the game is playable using the unity editor as the camera viewport. This is because I ended up using Unity gizmos, which aren't visable on a project that is build.

For now I asked my sister if she want to create art for the game. If she does I'll update the site with pictures, but for now this will have to do...
